name: Fallout 4: Wasteland Workshop
description:
Fallout 4: Wasteland Workshop is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Bethesda Game Studios. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Bethesda Softworks. On review aggregator Metacritic, Fallout 4: Wasteland Workshop has a score of 53. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Fallout 4: Wasteland Workshop is available on PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. The game is sold via Xbox Store, PlayStation Store and Steam.
